segment.source: How to Install the MBAM Language Update on Distributed Servers
segment.target: How to Install the MBAM Language Update on Distributed Servers

segment.source: How to Install the MBAM Language Update on Distributed Servers
segment.target: How to Install the MBAM Language Update on Distributed Servers

segment.source: How to Install the MBAM Language Update on Distributed Servers
segment.target: How to Install the MBAM Language Update on Distributed Servers

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) includes four server roles that can be run on one or more computers.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) includes four server roles that can be run on one or more computers.

segment.source: However, only two MBAM Server features require the update to support the installation of the MBAM 1.0 language release and the MBAM Policy Template.
segment.target: However, only two MBAM Server features require the update to support the installation of the MBAM 1.0 language release and the MBAM Policy Template.

segment.source: In configurations with the MBAM Server features installed on multiple computers, only the following server features need to be updated:
segment.target: In configurations with the MBAM Server features installed on multiple computers, only the following server features need to be updated:

segment.source: The MBAM Compliance and Audit Reports
segment.target: The MBAM Compliance and Audit Reports

segment.source: The MBAM Administration and Monitoring Server
segment.target: The MBAM Administration and Monitoring Server

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The MBAM server features must be updated in this order: Compliance and Audit Reports first, and then the Administration and Monitoring Server.
segment.target: The MBAM server features must be updated in this order: Compliance and Audit Reports first, and then the Administration and Monitoring Server.

segment.source: The MBAM Group Policy templates can be updated at any time without concern for sequence.
segment.target: The MBAM Group Policy templates can be updated at any time without concern for sequence.

segment.source: To install the MBAM Language Update on the MBAM Compliance and Audit Report Server feature
segment.target: To install the MBAM Language Update on the MBAM Compliance and Audit Report Server feature

segment.source: On the computer running the MBAM Compliance and Audit Report feature, locate and run the MBAM Language Update setup wizard (MBAMsetup.exe).
segment.target: On the computer running the MBAM Compliance and Audit Report feature, locate and run the MBAM Language Update setup wizard (MBAMsetup.exe).

segment.source: Complete the wizard for the Compliance and Audit Reports and then close the wizard.
segment.target: Complete the wizard for the Compliance and Audit Reports and then close the wizard.

segment.source: To install the MBAM Language Update on the MBAM Administration and Monitoring Server feature
segment.target: To install the MBAM Language Update on the MBAM Administration and Monitoring Server feature

segment.source: On the computer that is running the MBAM Administration and Monitoring feature, open the Internet Information Services (IIS) management console, go to Sites, and then shut down the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring website.
segment.target: On the computer that is running the MBAM Administration and Monitoring feature, open the Internet Information Services (IIS) management console, go to Sites, and then shut down the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring website.

segment.source: Choose to edit the bindings for the MBAM website, and then modify the bindings of the site.
segment.target: Choose to edit the bindings for the MBAM website, and then modify the bindings of the site.

segment.source: For example, change the port from 443 to 9443.
segment.target: For example, change the port from 443 to 9443.

segment.source: Locate and run the MBAM Language Update setup wizard (MBAMsetup.exe).
segment.target: Locate and run the MBAM Language Update setup wizard (MBAMsetup.exe).

segment.source: Complete the wizard for the Administration and Monitoring Server feature and then close the wizard.
segment.target: Complete the wizard for the Administration and Monitoring Server feature and then close the wizard.

segment.source: After you upgrade the server database, open IIS Management Console and review the bindings of the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring website.
segment.target: After you upgrade the server database, open IIS Management Console and review the bindings of the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring website.

segment.source: Delete the old binding and ensure that the remaining binding has the correct host name, certificate, and port number for the MBAM enterprise configuration.
segment.target: Delete the old binding and ensure that the remaining binding has the correct host name, certificate, and port number for the MBAM enterprise configuration.

segment.source: Restart the MBAM web site.
segment.target: Restart the MBAM web site.

segment.source: Test the MBAM web site functionality:
segment.target: Test the MBAM web site functionality:

segment.source: Open the MBAM web interface and ensure that you can obtain a recovery key for a client.
segment.target: Open the MBAM web interface and ensure that you can obtain a recovery key for a client.

segment.source: Enforce encryption of a new or manually decrypted client computer.
segment.target: Enforce encryption of a new or manually decrypted client computer.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The MBAM client opens only if it can communicate with the Recovery and Hardware database.
segment.target: The MBAM client opens only if it can communicate with the Recovery and Hardware database.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update
segment.target: Deploying the MBAM 1.0 Language Release Update
